services.helthDesc: Secure your official student health insurance quickly and safely.
services.residenceDesc: Let us handle your student residence permit application with ease.
services.universityApplyDesc: Get support with your admission to top universities in Türkiye.
services.CertificateAccreditationDesc: Accredit your certificates for use in Türkiye’s education system.

feautures.univirst: From university admission to health insurance and residency — everything you need in one place.
feautures.smsysmt: Our smart system lets you submit requests and track updates online.
feautures.Trusted: Trusted by thousands of students and residents across Turkey.
feautures.ourteam: Our team is always ready to help — fast responses, real people, real solutions.
feautures.wework: We work directly with top Turkish universities, government offices, and embassies.
feautures.weempower: We empower individuals and agencies to earn through our affiliate program with custom tools and tracking.
